name: Bebop'n Lula
description:
This game was made for Gdevelop Game Jam  2 with GDevelop as game engine.
We used other tools to make the assets.
This game might look short to some of you, but remember it was done in ten days.
Please rate this game friendly if you rate it. Here's the link to the liluo game : https://liluo.io/games/0235b4e8-ea4a-44e0-af9e-ceb0e4910617 Enjoy !
